column4: after upgrading to 8.10, gnome system sounds no longer work. (I'm using pulse, as opposed to esd, and am surprised that the default doesn't work)  Anyone know how to fix this?
gonzaload_laptop: you mean like this? "sudo update-initramfs -k all -u"
is there any workaround for firefox being slow with java? I am experiencing same thing here
I have better luck with sun's java than icedtea or the other one (I forget what it's called)
